notes.note:
Performance enhancements:
 - Faster page load times using Race Cache With Network (RCWN)
 - Faster load times for content on the Firefox Home page
 - Improved graphics rendering using [Off-Main-Thread Painting (OMTP)][1] for Mac users (OMTP for Windows and Linux was released in [Firefox 58][2])

  [1]: https://mozillagfx.wordpress.com/2017/12/05/off-main-thread-painting/
  [2]: https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/58.0/releasenotes/

Drag-and-drop to rearrange Top Sites on the Firefox Home page, [and other ways to customize new windows and tabs][1].


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/customize-new-tab-page#w_rearrange-top-sites

[Added features][1] for [Firefox Screenshots][2]:
 - Basic annotation lets you draw on and highlight saved screenshots
 - Recropping to change the viewable area of your saved screenshots


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-screenshots#w_how-do-i-edit-screenshots
  [2]: https://screenshots.firefox.com/

Added the ability to [autofill credit card][1] information in forms (en-US release only).


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/automatically-fill-address-and-credit-cards

[Added features][1] for [Firefox Screenshots][2]:
 - Basic annotation lets you draw on and highlight saved screenshots
 - Recropping to change the viewable area of your saved screenshots


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-screenshots#w_how-do-i-edit-screenshots
  [2]: https://screenshots.firefox.com/

## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows 7
 - Windows 8
 - Windows 10

### Recommended Hardware
-  Pentium 4 or newer processor that supports SSE2
-  512MB of RAM / 2GB of RAM for the 64-bit version
-  200MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- macOS 10.9
- macOS 10.10
- macOS 10.11
- macOS 10.12
- macOS 10.13

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - GTK+ 3.4 or higher
    - GLib 2.22 or higher
    - Pango 1.14 or higher
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
    - libstdc++ 4.6.1 or higher
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - GNOME 2.16 or higher
    - PulseAudio

  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/get-latest-version-firefox-windows-xp-vista
